description: Your marker is on space 10 of the Emperor track or higher.
You have played at least 6 staff cards (of any types).
There are at least 12 room tiles (of any color) on your hotel board. It does not matter whether they are vacant or occupied.
You have at least 7 champagne in your kitchen.
You have at least 3 strudel, at least 3 cake, at least 3 wine, and at least 3 coffee in your kitchen.
At least 2 floors in your hotel are fully occupied. These floors need not be adjacent.
At least 2 columns in your hotel are fully occupied. These columns need not be adjacent.
At least 6 groups of rooms in your hotel (of any colors) are fully occupied. The groups need not be contiguous.
All rooms of at least one color in your hotel are occupied.
You have at least 7 dancers across any number of ballrooms (including the balcony).
At least 3 rooms (of any color) in the top floor of your hotel are occupied.
You have at least 3 red, at least 3 blue, and at least 3 yellow occupied rooms in your hotel.
You have at least 4 red and at least 3 yellow occupied rooms in your hotel.
You have at least 4 yellow and at least 3 blue occupied rooms in your hotel.
You have at least 4 blue and at least 3 red occupied rooms in your hotel.
You have completed the orders of at least 4 green guests.
You have completed the orders of at least 5 guests who each ordered 3 or more items
